title: Slow Cooker Sausage Spanish Rice Recipe
directions: In a 3- or 4-qt. slow cooker, combine all ingredients. Cover and cook on low for 5-6 hours or until rice is tender. Yield: 6 servings
ingredients: 1 pound smoked kielbasa or Polish sausage, sliced
2 cans (14-1/2 ounces each) diced tomatoes, undrained
